product_name: Hugger Mugger Uinta Yoga Mat Bag
long_description: Travel to and from class with the Hugger Mugger Uinta yoga mat bag. Polyester fabric dries quickly when wet and stands up to regular use. Mesh bottom promotes airflow to help keep your mat dry. Small exterior pocket secures a cell phone and wallet; clip holds your car keys. Designed to hold Hugger Mugger Original Tapas yoga mats, Hugger Mugger Ultra yoga mats, Hugger Mugger Travel yoga mats and Hugger Mugger Earth Elements 3mm and 5mm mats. Fits other similarly-sized mats. Hugger Mugger Uinta yoga mat bag includes a drawstring closure and adjustable shoulder strap.
short_description: Travel to and from class with the Hugger Mugger Uinta yoga mat bag.
